item.title: Drift
item.dc:creator: hello@nectarblocks.com
item.content:encoded:
Opportunity

Aether Labs partnered with us to explore identity in fluxusing motion as the medium and a living, liquid form as the message. The result was Drift: a 3D-rendered study in digital fluidity that moves with intention and unpredictability. Designed to feel alive, it blurs the boundary between the organic and the engineered, becoming a vessel for futuristic expression. This was less about representing identity and more about letting it evolveshape-shifting, shimmering, and always in motion.

From the start, they grasped the pace and ambition of our growth and built a site that could evolve right alongside us. The product is smart, the design intuitive, and it bridges the gap between our audiences.

Jacob Anderson

CEO, Aether

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Aether Labs partnered with us to explore identity through motion with a 3D-rendered liquid form that feels alive. Drift blurs the line between digital fluidity and futuristic expression.

item.title: Monolith
item.dc:creator: hello@nectarblocks.com
item.content:encoded:
Opportunity

Noir Systems approached us with an open briefan invitation to explore abstraction through movement. What emerged was Monolith: a stark, black-and-white motion study that leans into repetition, weightlessness, and the quiet tension of form. Designed for an audience fluent in experimentation, this piece strips away the unnecessary to focus on rhythm and restraint. Its less about narrative and more about sensationa visual loop where structure becomes atmosphere, and minimalism finds its gravity.

From the start, they grasped the pace and ambition of our growth and built a site that could evolve right alongside us. The product is smart, the design intuitive, and it bridges the gap between our audiences.

Jacob Anderson

CEO, Monolith

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: An abstract black-and-white motion study created for experimental tech collective Noir Systems. Monolith plays with repetition, weightlessness, and the tension of form.

item.title: Crimson Echo
item.dc:creator: hello@nectarblocks.com
item.content:encoded:
Opportunity

Crimson Echo came to us with a bold ambition: to design a piece that could serve as the emotional core of their latest releasea project rooted in memory, contrast, and quiet power. They werent just looking for visuals; they were searching for a mood, a presence, something that would linger. The challenge was to balance rawness with refinement, to create an aesthetic language that echoed the brands intensity while staying grounded in subtlety.

From the start, they grasped the pace and ambition of our growth and built a site that could evolve right alongside us. The product is smart, the design intuitive, and it bridges the gap between our audiences.

Jacob Anderson

CEO, Crimson Echo

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: For luxury fashion house Maison Aurelle, we crafted a bold, cinematic campaign bathed in red. Crimson Echo captures confidence, intimacy, and the power of presence.

item.title: Bloom Theory
item.dc:creator: hello@nectarblocks.com
item.content:encoded:
Opportunity

Viola Studios approached us with a vision: to create a visual anchor for their spring campaign that felt both timeless and emotionally resonant. They needed more than just a seasonal motifthey wanted a statement piece that could embody the essence of renewal while aligning seamlessly with their brands elegant, understated aesthetic. This was an opportunity to craft something deeply expressivewhere art, identity, and intention could converge.

From the start, they grasped the pace and ambition of our growth and built a site that could evolve right alongside us. The product is smart, the design intuitive, and it bridges the gap between our audiences.

Jacob Anderson

CEO, Bloom Theory

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Inspired by classic portraiture and modern femininity, Bloom Theory is a hand-painted centerpiece for Viola Studios seasonal collection. It celebrates growth, softness, and quiet strength.

item.title: Edge & Emerald
item.dc:creator: hello@nectarblocks.com
item.content:encoded:
Opportunity

Forma Co. approached us with a clear vision: create a brand identity that felt both precise and palpable. The result was Edge & Emeralda clean, tactile system that fuses sharp typography with bold, material-driven textures. Its a study in contrast and cohesion, where refined design meets raw surface. Every element was crafted to reflect Formas thoughtful, design-forward ethoselevated, grounded, and unmistakably theirs.

From the start, they grasped the pace and ambition of our growth and built a site that could evolve right alongside us. The product is smart, the design intuitive, and it bridges the gap between our audiences.

Jacob Anderson

CEO, Edge & Emerald

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Clean, tactile branding for design consultancy Forma Co. Edge & Emerald pairs sharp typography with bold material textures for a distinct visual identity.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: hello@nectarblocks.com
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Firstlight Overview
item.dc:creator: hello@nectarblocks.com
item.content:encoded:
A Creative

design Studio

innovative digital creative services

The home of aesthetics

Were a design agency built for growth. We craft refined websites that dont just look good, but work hard, turning bold vision into real-world results.

Work

We craft connected experiences that shape how people see, feel, and engage.

(Case Studies)

Approach

Founded in Philadelphia in 2020, Firstlight launched as a design firm with a mission to empower visionary founders.

1

Strategy First

We begin every project with clarity. Understanding your vision, your audience, and your competitive landscape to build a strong foundation.

Brand discovery
User insight
Competitive analysis
Creative direction

2

Design with Intent

Our design process is driven by meaning, not just aesthetics. Every choice is made to resonate, engage, and communicate clearly.

Systems-thinking
Visual storytelling
Scalable design
Color mastery

3

Build for Impact

We craft with precision translating ideas into functional, high-performing digital experiences built to stand the test of time.

Execution
Performance design
Platform decisions
Accessibility

At a glance

(Company highlights)

42+

42 Brands and counting successfully launched since 2020.

30+

Our team consists of 30 members from across the globe.

24x

We've been awarded 24 Site of the Day awards from awwwards.

97%

We have a 97% Client satisfaction rate across all projects.

$10M+

Over 10 million dollars in business completed since launch.

(Plans)

Propel your business and get the edge you've been looking for.

Get Started Now
BasicGrowth

$

1,499

/ Month

$

4,299

/ Month

Cancel anytime
Unlimited results
Daily updates

item.title: Pricing

item.content:encoded:
No fluff, no fine print just straight-up pricing that backs the craft, brains, and bold thinking behind everything we create. Got a vision? Lets make it real.

(Plans)

Propel your business and get the edge you've been looking for.

Get Started Now

/ Month

$10M+

Over 10 million dollars in business completed since launch.
